GXM.data.LayerStore¶

Extends
  • Ext.data.Store
xtype
gxm_layerstore
class GXM.data.MapPanel(config)¶

The class that is used to construct a GXM LayerStore.

Config Options¶

Configuration properties in addition to those listed for Ext.data.Store.

model

String The identifier for the model to be used. Defaults to gxm_layer.

proxy

String/Ext.data.Proxy/Object The proxy to be used by the store. Defaults to a configuration object for a Ext.data.MemoryProxy that has a GXM.data.LayerReader set as reader-property.

sortDirection

String The direction to order the store by if no sorters. Defaults to DESC.

sorterFn

Function The method used to sort store items. The method will be called with two objects (instances of the configured model) and should implement logic that determines ordering of the passed objects. Your method should return

  • 1 if the first object is greater than the second object
  • -1 if the second object is greater than the first
  • 0 if they are equal.

Here is an example method:

function(obj_1, obj_2) {
    var layer_1 = obj_1.getLayer(),
        layer_2 = obj_2.getLayer(),
        idx_1 = layer_1.getZIndex(),
        idx_2 = layer_2.getZIndex(),
        res = (idx_1 > idx_2 ? 1 : (idx_1 < idx_2 ? -1 : 0));
    return res;
}

You can further control the sort direction by sortDirection.

sorters

Array(Ext.util.Sorter) An array of Sorters to be used for ordering of the records. Defaults to a single sorter that orders the layers descending according to the stack size inside of the map. That means that layers drawn atop of others in the map will be on top inside of lists that make use of this store.

The configuration of the single sorter can also be configured using the sortDirection configuration properties.
